description:
Hishikawa Moronobu is the man that offers http://anidb.net/ch4863 [Fuu] a free meal, entices her into being his ukiyo-e model. He is actually (somewhat unwillingly) part of a prostitution scam, to sell girls overseas. At the end, he leaves for Holland.
It is revealed that he is immediately sent straight back to Japan, but his picture of Fuu stays in Holland to supposedly inspire Vincent van Gogh to paint sunflowers.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Hishikawa Moronobu
